front.title: A Profile for Endpoint Identifier Origin Authorizations (IOA)

abstract.t: This document defines a standard profile for End-Point IdentifiersOrigin Authorizations (IOAs). An IOA is a digitally signed objectthat provides a means of verifying that the EID IP address blockholder has authorized a set of Router Locators (RLOCs) as its de-encapsulation point in a Map & Encap mapping service.
